verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
A man is no fool to give what he cannot keep
In order to gain what he cannot lose.
A man is no fool to give what he cannot keep
In order to gain what he cannot lose.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
A man is no fool to give and give and give,
To give and give and give and give and give.
A man is no fool to give what he cannot keep
In order to gain what he cannot lose.
